code: @Override public void run(final ApplicationArguments args) throws Exception {     final Predicate<String> operations = "operation"::equals.     final Map<String, Object> headers = args.getOptionNames().stream().filter(operations.negate()).collect(Collectors.toMap(identity(), arg -> args.getOptionValues(arg).get(0))).     final String body = template.requestBodyAndHeaders("rest-swagger:" + specificationUri + "#" + operation, null, headers, String.class).     System.out.println(body).     SpringApplication.exit(context, () -> 0). }
public static void main(final String[] args) {     SpringApplication.run(RestSwaggerApplication.class, args). }
